Startup.title: Proprietorship
Startup.content: A Proprietorship is a business owned and operated by a single individual.

Startup.title: Partnership
Startup.content: A Partnership is a business owned by two or more individuals.

Startup.title: One Person Company
Startup.content: An One Person Company (OPC) is a new type of company in India where only one person can hold the entire shareholding.

Startup.title: Limited Liability Partnership
Startup.content: An LLP is a business structure that combines the benefits of a partnership and a company.

Startup.title: Private Limited Company
Startup.content: A Private Limited Company is a type of company that is privately owned and offers limited liability to its owners.

Startup.title: Section 8 Company
Startup.content: A Section 8 Company is a non-profit organization registered under the Companies Act 2013 in India.

Startup.title: Trust Registration
Startup.content: Trust Registration is the legal process of forming a trust for charitable or social purposes.

Startup.title: Public Limited Company
Startup.content: A Public Limited Company is a company whose shares are publicly traded on the stock exchange.

Startup.title: Producer Company
Startup.content: A Producer Company is a type of organization formed by farmers and producers to improve the marketing of their products.

Startup.title: Indian Subsidiary
Startup.content: An Indian Subsidiary is a company incorporated in India that is owned by a foreign company.

Registration.title: Company Registration
Registration.content: We assist you in registering your company with complete legal compliance and documentation.

Registration.title: Startup India
Registration.content: Startup India initiative by the Indian Government promotes innovation through benefits for startups.

Registration.title: Trade License
Registration.content: Obtain your trade license quickly and hassle-free to comply with municipal regulations.

Registration.title: FSSAI Registration
Registration.content: Essential for businesses in the food sector to ensure hygiene and safety compliance.

Registration.title: FSSAI License
Registration.content: Get your FSSAI License to run your food business legally with proper food safety approvals.

Registration.title: Shop Act Registration
Registration.content: Mandatory for shops and establishments to regulate working conditions and employee rights.

Registration.title: Halal License & Certification
Registration.content: Ensure your products meet Halal standards with our certification services.

Registration.title: ICEGATE Registration
Registration.content: Register on ICEGATE to facilitate imports, exports, and customs clearance digitally.

Registration.title: Import Export Code
Registration.content: Obtain IEC to start import-export operations under DGFT regulations.

Registration.title: Legal Entity Identifier Code
Registration.content: LEI code is a unique ID required for legal entities participating in financial transactions.

Registration.title: ISO Registration
Registration.content: Improve your business credibility with ISO certifications across various standards.

Registration.title: PF Registration
Registration.content: Register for Provident Fund to ensure social security benefits for employees.

Registration.title: ESI Registration
Registration.content: ESI registration enables employee health insurance and social protection.

Registration.title: Professional Tax Registration
Registration.content: Register to comply with state-imposed taxes on professionals and salaried employees.

Registration.title: RCMC Registration
Registration.content: RCMC is essential for exporters to avail benefits under foreign trade policies.

Registration.title: TN RERA Registration for Agents
Registration.content: Mandatory for real estate agents in Tamil Nadu to operate legally under RERA.

Registration.title: 12A and 80G Registration
Registration.content: Get income tax exemptions for NGOs by registering under 12A and 80G.

Registration.title: 12A Registration
Registration.content: Secure 12A registration to gain tax exemption status for your NGO.

Registration.title: 80G Registration
Registration.content: Allow donors to avail income tax deductions through 80G registration.

Registration.title: APEDA Registration
Registration.content: Mandatory for exporters of agricultural products to register with APEDA.

Registration.title: Barcode Registration
Registration.content: Get barcode registration to track retail and inventory efficiently.

Registration.title: BIS Registration
Registration.content: Ensure product quality with Bureau of Indian Standards certification.

Registration.title: Certificate of Incumbency
Registration.content: Get an official record of current officers of a company for verification.

Registration.title: Darpan Registration
Registration.content: NGOs must register on the Darpan portal to receive government grants.

Registration.title: Digital Signature
Registration.content: Digital signatures are essential for online filing, contracts, and secure authentication.

Registration.title: Digital Signature - DGFT Version
Registration.content: DGFT-specific DSCs are required for businesses dealing in imports/exports.

Registration.title: Drug License
Registration.content: Mandatory license for businesses dealing in pharmaceutical products.

Registration.title: Udyam Registration
Registration.content: Register as an MSME to enjoy various government incentives and schemes.

Registration.title: FCRA Registration
Registration.content: Required for NGOs receiving foreign contributions or donations.

Registration.title: Fire License
Registration.content: Necessary for establishments to certify fire safety compliance.
